sentences.sContent: Inside the reactor the large molecules are cracked into smaller molecules.
sentences.sContent_eng: Inside the reactor the large molecules are cracked into smaller molecules.
sentences.sCn: 在反应堆内部大的分子被裂解为较小的分子。

sentences.sContent: The competition became so keen that many of smaller companies were frozen out.
sentences.sContent_eng: The competition became so keen that many of smaller companies were frozen out.
sentences.sCn: 竞争是如此激烈，许多较小的公司被排挤了出来。

sentences.sContent: With the changes in the world's climate, dinosaurs died, but many smaller animals lived on. It was the survival of the fittest.
sentences.sContent_eng: With the changes in the world's climate, dinosaurs died, but many smaller animals lived on. It was the survival of the fittest.
sentences.sCn: 随着世界气候的变迁， 恐龙绝迹了， 但许多较小的动物却继续活了下来。 这就是适者生存。
